solver
Class Solver2

java.lang.Object
  solver.Solver
      solver.LESolver
          solver.Solver2
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Solver2
extends LESolver

Class for direct-symmetric-Gauss elimination linear equation solver. It can be used for solving linear system of equations (A x = b). It is an implementation of Gauss elimination procedure. This class uses an external executable file called "SYMSOLVR.exe".

Author:
Murat Artim
See Also:
Serialized Form

solve

public void solve(Mat matA,
                  DVec vecB,
                  DVec vecX)
Solves system of linear equations (A x = b).

Specified by:
solve in class LESolver
Parameters:
matA - Coefficient matrix (A). Has to be in USB1 form (assumed positive definite).
vecB - Right hand side vector (b). Has to be dense vector (DVec).
vecX - Solution vector (x). Has to be dense vector (DVec).
